sentences.sContent: There are some objections to the proposal to reelect the chairman.
sentences.sContent_eng: There are some objections to the proposal to reelect the chairman.
sentences.sCn: 对重新选举董事长的提议有人持反对意见。

sentences.sContent: And proxy advisory firm Institutional Shareholder Services recently recommended that News Corp shareholders not reelect several board members, including chairman and CEO Rupert Murdoch, and his sons.
sentences.sContent_eng: And proxy advisory firm Institutional Shareholder Services recently recommended that News Corp shareholders not reelect several board members, including chairman and CEO Rupert Murdoch, and his sons.
sentences.sCn: 同时，代理顾问服务公司ISS建议新闻集团股东在今年的股东大会上改选几名董事会成员，包括新闻集团董事长兼CEO鲁伯特•默多克和他的两个儿子。
